name: Revolvus
description:
We kinda overshot on this one, no menu or sound effects for us. At least we finished it in time.

In Revolvus, you fight your way through a horde of monsters. Then you do it again. Then again. And again.

The monsters get faster every time, the challenge is seeing how many times you can get through before they beat you.

1280 by 720 resolution.

Z to jump, X to attack, C to dash, and ESC to quit.
